title: SSL/TLS Handshake Failure
scenario: A customer reports that api.color.com is showing an insecure connection on the web UI which also may cause some outages for customers using our API

title: Possible PII/PHI Leak
scenario: Jim from NIH created a pulse on Metabase via dashboard.color.com, Jim later notifies support@color.com the wrong COVID-19 results for UCSF are returning in the dashboard

title: Complete outage for all Color apps and API
scenario: During a production db upgrade, all Color apps and API are unreachable. Multiple customers notify us that they are receiving 500 errors and ask to bring the sites back up immediately.

title: Vaccine product launch causes intermittent connection
scenario: A new product launch (vaccine) was launched Monday morning. The primary on-call immediately starts to get paged `5XX count GreaterThanOrEqualToThreshold of 10`

title: PHI and PII logs are exposed on Datadog
scenario: A new service was created and had all application logs sent to Datadog. Someone notices the logs include PHI and PII which is visible to anyone with Datadog access.
